title: The Jesuit's memorial for the intended reformation of England under their first popish prince published from the copy that was presented to the late King James II : with an introduction, and some animadversions by Edward Gee ...
author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.
notes: "Subscribed by the author's own hand" signed: Rob. Parsons.
Title of original manuscript, "A memorial of the reformation of England ... gathered and set down by R.P. 1596." Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
